Method Detail

onActivate

void onActivate(HtmlEditor field)
Fires when the editor is first receives the focus. Any insertion must wait until after this event.

Parameters:
field - this

doBeforePush

boolean doBeforePush(HtmlEditor field,
                     java.lang.String html)
Fires before the iframe editor is updated with content from the textarea. Return false to cancel the push.

Parameters:
field - this
html - the html
Returns:
false to cancel

doBeforeSync

boolean doBeforeSync(HtmlEditor field,
                     java.lang.String html)
Fires before the textarea is updated with content from the editor iframe. Return false to cancel the sync.

Parameters:
field - this
html - the html
Returns:
false to cancel sync

                      boolean sourceEdit)
Fires when the editor switches edit modes.

Parameters:
field - this
sourceEdit - true if source edit, false if standard editing
